page.title: 16Thirsk Auction Mart
page.content: Thirsk Auction Mart is one of the largest one-day marts in Europe. They can now handle about 5OOO animals and they are expanding. The animals and dealers come from all over the country. There are two big selling halls and a show ring. The cattle are driven through a weighbridge into the show ring and are sold separately. They are sold at so many pence per kilogramme.The sheep and pigs who also go over automatic weighbridges as they enter the hall are sold in pen loads as the auctioneer walks on planks laid over the pens. The auctioneer talks so fast that you can hardly understand him.He sells a cow in about 25 seconds and a pen of sheep in about the same time. The buyers bid by winking, nodding and by using special signs. {T.Dewar/P.Cruickshank
